title: Decolonized Language Curriculum Design Based on Real-Life Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners (office/administrative workers) experience linguistic conflict simulations in multicultural workplace settings via VR, acquiring decolonial communication strategies

learning_goals: Learners understand decolonizing education principles and can explain at least three power dynamics manifested in language use
Learners can select and apply neutral expressions free from cultural bias in VR simulations with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze real-world cases from multicultural workplace settings from a decolonial perspective and propose alternative communication strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
